newsitem.title: GERMANY: Hypo-Bank outperforms in afternoon trade.
newsitem.headline: Hypo-Bank outperforms in afternoon trade.

text.p: Shares in German bank Bayerische Hypotheken-und Wechselbank strongly outperformed the IBIS DAX index in afternoon trade on Friday, as takeover rumours resurfaced to lift the stock, dealers said.

In afternoon trade Hypo-Bank was up 2.40 marks, or 1.80 percent, at 53.60 marks, off earlier highs when the stock hit 54 marks, but comfortably outperforming the IBIS DAX index which was down 1.25 percent at 2,999.41 points.
Dealers said that speculation of mergers in the banking sector was boosting bank shares over the day. "Bank stocks are all doing quite well by comparison today," said one trader.
